actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution relative to the rights of Romanian citizens.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Calls upon Romania to restore religious freedom to the Byzantine Rite Catholic Church and the Latin Rite Catholic Church and to permit all churches to spend aid received from abroad on the repair of their churches.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution relative to the rights of Romanian citizens.
